extendedInfo.description: With this great new app you will be able to better your language skills, by being able to translate and study with flashcards. After you translate with the 37 languages included in the app, your translated words and phrases will be saved into a list. After that, you can change them into flashcards super easy! Not only that but there are preloaded flashcards sets with phrases in German, Spanish, Italian, and French. The new update makes it way better, by allowing you to hear the words that you are learning. Have fun studying and learning the language that you love!

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great app, not only a translator but allows you to make your previous translated terms into flashcards to study! No more translating something 100 times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Troy
reviews.comment: Flash cards work great! Ich liebes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and fast
reviews.comment: Works just like it says. Great app
reviews.author: A Google User
